svg.text: Week in Ethereum News - October 28 2023

title: "Week in Ethereum News
October 28, 2023" date: "2023-10-27"
Eth News and Links
Dencun (Cancun + Deneb) upgrade
â€¢ Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video . Notes from Tim Beiko and Christine Kim :
Mainnet : upgrade likely to be 2024 (minimum 2 week gap between each testnet upgrade) Goerli testnet :
upgrade late November (at the earliest), CL clients not ready yet Devnet 10 : normal & stress testing
analysis, tested EIP7514 (max churn limit) Devnet 11 : launch early next week, test all clients with
MEV pipeline Goerli shadow fork : launch early next week Discussed EIP7523 (empty accounts
deprecation)
Latest all core devs â€“ execution (ACDE) call video . Notes from Tim Beiko and Christine Kim :
â€¢ Mainnet : upgrade likely to be 2024 (minimum 2 week gap between each testnet upgrade)
Mainnet : upgrade likely to be 2024 (minimum 2 week gap between each testnet upgrade)
â€¢ Goerli testnet : upgrade late November (at the earliest), CL clients not ready yet
Goerli testnet : upgrade late November (at the earliest), CL clients not ready yet
â€¢ Devnet 10 : normal & stress testing analysis, tested EIP7514 (max churn limit)
Devnet 10 : normal & stress testing analysis, tested EIP7514 (max churn limit)
â€¢ Devnet 11 : launch early next week, test all clients with MEV pipeline
Devnet 11 : launch early next week, test all clients with MEV pipeline
â€¢ Goerli shadow fork : launch early next week
Goerli shadow fork : launch early next week
â€¢ Discussed EIP7523 (empty accounts deprecation)
Discussed EIP7523 (empty accounts deprecation)
â€¢ Proposed Deneb simplification to attach the block header & an inclusion proof on each blob sidecar
Proposed Deneb simplification to attach the block header & an inclusion proof on each blob sidecar
Centralization watch: threatening the value of your ETH
â€¢ ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.51% has reduced again but still far too close to 33.3% threshold
ðŸš¨ Lido at 31.51% has reduced again but still far too close to 33.3% threshold
â€¢ Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ): Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could
possibly cause a chain split Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss
of finality
Client diversity (via clientdiversity.org ):
â€¢ Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
Execution layer: Geth ~84% supermajority, could possibly cause a chain split
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
Consensus layer: Prysm at 45%, any client bug over 33.3% could mean loss of finality
â€¢ Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Canada/EU
Geographic diversity needed for stakers & nodes , particularly outside of US/Canada/EU
Layer 1
â€¢ Verkle Kaustinen testnet back online, upgraded to Shapella, proof witnesses include post state and
adds Lodestar CL client
Client releases
â€¢ Consensus layer: Prysm v4.1.1 : patch to fix using REST API with external builder and experimental
state deadlock
Consensus layer:
â€¢ Prysm v4.1.1 : patch to fix using REST API with external builder and experimental state deadlock
â€¢ Execution layer: Besu v23.10.1 : UX, memory and RPC performance improvements Erigon v2.53.2 : fixes
Nethermind v1.21.1 : hotfix for invalid block production
Execution layer:
â€¢ Besu v23.10.1 : UX, memory and RPC performance improvements
Besu v23.10.1 : UX, memory and RPC performance improvements
â€¢ Erigon v2.53.2 : fixes
Erigon v2.53.2 : fixes
â€¢ Nethermind v1.21.1 : hotfix for invalid block production
Research
â€¢ SubnetDAS : proposal for intermediate DAS approach with linkability of queries tradeoff
SubnetDAS : proposal for intermediate DAS approach with linkability of queries tradeoff
â€¢ Family of embedded curves for BLS
Family of embedded curves for BLS
Layer 2
â€¢ First monthly RollCall (Layer 2 protocol & EVM standardization) call video : intros, Rollup
Improvement Proposals (RIPs), EIP7212 (secp256r1 precompile) as first RIP, Devconnect discussion
topics and EIP7530 (EVM profiles)
â€¢ intros, Rollup Improvement Proposals (RIPs), EIP7212 (secp256r1 precompile) as first RIP, Devconnect
discussion topics and EIP7530 (EVM profiles)
EIPs/Standards
â€¢ ERCs split from EIPs
ERCs split from EIPs
â€¢ EIPs EIP7542 : eth/69 - available-blocks-extended protocol EIP7543 : EVM decimal math (opcodes)
EIP7545 : Verkle proof verification precompile
EIPs

EIP7543 : EVM decimal math (opcodes)

â€¢ ERCs (application layer): (Informational) ERC7544 : Security flaws in ERC20 transfer patterns
(tokens sent to contracts can be lost) ERC7546 : Upgradeable clone (proxy pattern)

â€¢ (Informational) ERC7544 : Security flaws in ERC20 transfer patterns (tokens sent to contracts can be
lost)

â€¢ ERC7546 : Upgradeable clone (proxy pattern)

Stuff for developers
â€¢ Solidity v0.8.22 : Adds unchecked loop increments, Yul optimizer rematerializes zero literals,
experimental support to import EVM Assembly JSON and event definition at file level EVM versions
before Constantinople deprecated
Solidity v0.8.22 :
â€¢ Adds unchecked loop increments, Yul optimizer rematerializes zero literals, experimental support to
import EVM Assembly JSON and event definition at file level
Adds unchecked loop increments, Yul optimizer rematerializes zero literals, experimental support to
â€¢ EVM versions before Constantinople deprecated
EVM versions before Constantinople deprecated
â€¢ Hardhat: Ignition : declarative contract deployment with support for recovery Hardhat-verify v2 :
adds Sourcify verification, enable via config
Hardhat:
â€¢ Ignition : declarative contract deployment with support for recovery
Ignition : declarative contract deployment with support for recovery
â€¢ Hardhat-verify v2 : adds Sourcify verification, enable via config
Hardhat-verify v2 : adds Sourcify verification, enable via config
â€¢ OpenSea Shipyard : NFT libraries & implementations
OpenSea Shipyard : NFT libraries & implementations
â€¢ Fe (language) v0.25.0 : fe test adds print logs and filter to only run specific tests
Fe (language) v0.25.0 : fe test adds print logs and filter to only run specific tests

evm.storage : supports unverified contracts using bytecode-generated layouts

EVM Glue : EVM assembler in Rust

Security
â€¢ Maestro 280 ETH exploit via arbitrary call, users refunded
Maestro 280 ETH exploit via arbitrary call, users refunded
â€¢ Aztec Connect vulnerability postmortem , $450k bounty paid, withdraw funds from zk.money

Yearn

currently at 21.6 gwei 2.1k ETH net issuance this week
